description:
After naming Suou the new mayor of the Mud Whale, the elders tells him some secrets. Chakuro has a disturbing vision when he meets Neri.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Biz ve Çamur Balinası Kuma Mahkûmuz
Doro Kujira to Tomo ni Suna ni Mesareru no Da yo
Drown in Sand Alongside the Mud Whale
Zatopieni w piasku razem z Błotnym Wielorybem
泥クジラと共に砂に召されるのだよ
